Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Imy-r 3ḥw P3-w3t-n-im.w Born of T3-ḫ3ʿ.w with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a plaited beard and crossed hands in relief holding a relief adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in nine rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the foot.
